alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON AND ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over Vidor and around Beaumont, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Vidor, Bridge City, West Orange, Central Gardens, Mauriceville, Rose City, Pine Forest, Lakeview, Pinehurst, Port Acres, Hartburg, Forest Heights, Orangefield, and La Belle. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 878 and 857. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange
